main.name: Michael Ellis
main.bio: I'm passionate about software development, helping people, and solving problems. I've developed several successful enterprise and personal applications. Please feel free to contact to me!
main.contactmessage: If you would like to discuss any of my work or something related you can send me a message here. I enjoy learning and meeting new people so please don't hesitate to reach out!

education.description: At UNC Charlotte I focused on software engineering. I excelled in all degree related courses such as Mobile Application Development, Data Structures, Algorithms, Parallel Programming, and Microprocessors. I'm a lifelong learner and I strive to make the most of my experiences at UNCC.

work.title: Software Engineer
descriptions: Lead iOS developer for an enterprise app with over 2,000 users
Utilized Core Data and multi-threading for quick data syncs and offline functionality
Fixed all crashes upon joining app team and greatly reduced sync times
Contributed to and maintained internal iOS frameworks
Designed and programmed features to comply with industry regulations
Created PowerBI reports for enterpriseâ€™s Jira by creating database views
Maintained, supported, and improved a 10,000 user Enterprise Jira instance

work.title: Computer Science and Math Tutor
descriptions: Assisted students with understanding technical concepts such as data structures
Demonstrated and taught effective problem solving skills and use of resources

work.title: Software Developer Intern
descriptions: Developed a PowerShell module to perform document replacements and transfers for a company merger with Duke Energy
Developed data manipulation and migration scripts using PowerShell for testing
Designed and updated user interfaces for SharePoint sites and forms

resume.skillmessage: I'm always learning new skills. Here are some of the technologies I've spent the most time with and my proficiency with them.
